utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey! Ready to go?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh yeah, let me just finish this.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Ross, check this out! yeah, I can't do that!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What are you doin'?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Have you seen this? It's a new alumni website for college! It's cool! You can post messages for people, let everyone know what you're up to.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Great, a faster way to tell people that I'm unemployed and childless .

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It's actually kinda interesting to find out what people are doing... remember Andrea Rich?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: The tall girl who wouldn't sleep with you?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh uh... well, her Internet Company went under and she lost an ear in a boating accident...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Bet she'd sleep with you now...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No... I already e-mailed her.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Let me see what you wrote about yourself: "Doctor Paleontology, two kids... " You split with Carol because you have different interests?... I think you split with Carol because you've one very similar interest!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You know what? I'm gonna finish this later, ok? Let me just grab my coat.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What do you think you learned how to do in the last two minutes??

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Maybe we finish this for him! "Also I cloned a dinosaur in my lab. She's now my girlfriend. I don't care what society says. It's the best sex I've ever had"... aaand SEND!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, no, no... what do... you can't do that to him!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Alright, let's go!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dude!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I think you made it clear you cannot be trusted with the ball inside the house!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: aaand SEND!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey! How was basketball?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, it was a lot of fun right up until Chandler got a finger in the eye!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, no! Who did that?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Chandler... hey... Rach... what's Hugsy doin' in the crib with Emma?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: She was just crawling around and she found him, so I just let her sleep with him. That's all right? Isn't it?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, yeah... of course... yeah... it's a stuffed animal... you know... it's for kids... not for adults... I know that!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey... are you sure? I mean, I know how much you love him!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Rachel... let's be clear on this, ok? I do not love Hugsy. I like him a normal amount...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right... Oh, Emma loves him!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Why wouldn't she? He's a wonderful person!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey Phoebe... how you doin'? You feelin' better?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Breaking up sucks! Oh, I really miss Mike!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, I'm so sorry!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh God, I tried everything to make myself feel better. I even tried writing a song about it... but... I can't think of anything that rhymes with AARRGGHH!! Hey Monica, I really need your help getting through this...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You're not gonna need my help?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well no, when I get to the point where... you know... I'm ready to hear cruel mocking jokes about Mike... I'm gonna come to you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh good, 'cause I've already thought of 3... 4! I've just thought of a fourth

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ok. I mean I know I did the right thing. You know, Mike never wants to get married and I shouldn't be in a relationship that has no future... but... pretty soon I'm gonna miss him so much. I'm gonna wanna see him again and you have to stop me from doing that.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ok, you got it!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Unless... Maybe it's too crazy about this... Alright so... you know, there is no future... but that doesn't mean we still can't have fun. You know what? Forget what I said.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really? If that's what you want...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That was a test and you just failed.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Damn it! Rookie mistake!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I have sex with dinosaurs??

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I believe I read that somewhere!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That only is not funny, it's physically impossible! Ok? Depending on the species I'd have to have a six foot long... It's not funny!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I respectfully disagree.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I can't believe you put that on my alumni page!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Who cares? Nobody reads those things

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You'd better hope not because I just read what you put on your page today.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don't have a page.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh oh oh! I RESPECTFULLY DISAGREE!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look at you, all sweet and innocent, sleeping like an angel... with Emma's chubby little hands wrapped around ya. It's okay, Emma, you stay asleep.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: : Step away from the crib, I have a weapon!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It's okay, it's okay Rach, it's me. Put down the scrunchy.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, I heard Emma stirring, so I came to make sure she could reach Hugsy.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, oh thanks. Alright well, now that I'm up I'm going to go to the bathroom.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: There you go sweetie... This isn't over.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Alright, wait a second, why would Ross tell everyone in your class that you are as... "gay as the day is long"?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Because I told everyone he slept with dinosaurs.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: But that's clearly a joke. This could easily be true.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Would you get that please? People have been calling to congratulate me all day.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hello? No, he's not here. Yeah, this is his wife. Yeah, well, it came as quite a shock to me too. I guess I should have known. Yeah, I mean, he just kept making me watch Moulin Rouge.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hang up, hang up. And that was a great movie! I'm so gonna get back at Ross... oh yeah, this will show him, here we go .

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, you'll see my friend.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'm dead?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And so young.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Posting that I died? That really isn't funny.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, how you died was funny.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh please, hit by a blimp?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It kills over one americans every year.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Unbelievable, my classmates are gonna think I'm dead, my professors, my... my parents are gonna get phone calls. You're messing with people's feelings here.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You wanna talk about people's feelings? You should have heard how hurt professor Stern was yesterday when I told him I wouldn't be able to go with him to Key West!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You've really crossed the line here, but that's okay, it's ok 'cause I'm on my way to buy some Photoshop software and a stack of gay porn. That's right! Your coming out is about to get real graphic.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: God, I wish Mike were here.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay if Mike were here what would the two of you be doing?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What are you, animals? It's 4 o'clock in the afternoon!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I gotta call him. Just to talk to him, there's no harm in that.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe, that's how it starts. I don't need to eat the cake, I'll just smell the icing... why don't I just eat a little sliver, or, okay, just a slice or two. And next thing you know, you're 210 pounds and you get wedged in going down the tunnel slide. Phoebe, honey, I know this is hard. Look, if you talk to him, you're going to wanna see him. And if you see him, you're going to want to get back together with him. I know that's not what you want. Give me your phone.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Here.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And now your cell.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: This is your cellphone?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: This is your current cellphone?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes, it reminds me of a simpler time.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe, where's your purse?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, no! Give it to me!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You can't have it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Give it to me!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'll go in there.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe come here

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Haha!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Damn you Monica Geller hyphen Bing!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, look who's here! It's Joey, and he brought home a friend.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey, Emma's right here! You promised not to bring girls home in the middle of the day anymore.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, no, it's not a girl, it's... a brand new Hugsy!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh that's so great, now Emma has two Hugsy's.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, no, Emma has one Hugsy, the new Hugsy, huh? The other Hugsy, I don't know, I guess I'll just take it back.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh you know what? When I was a little girl I had a little pink pony named Cotton. Oh I loved her so much, I took her everywhere, I would braid her tail...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Make the transfer!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Should I be concerned that a button fell off the old Hugsy and I can't find it?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, no don't worry about that, I swallowed that years ago.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I don't think she likes the new Hugsy.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But he's the same.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, I think she wants the old one back.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But he's the same.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey, come on!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: He's the same!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You're not the same!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Haha!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You know, it's a lot less surprising to do that after I've buzzed you into the building.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So Phoebe, why are there men's shoes by the door.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Those are my shoes.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, when you get over this breakup we need to go shopping.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Monica, I really appreciate you checking in on me, but I'm actually feeling a lot better. Yeah, I just kinda want to be alone right now.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Who's that?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I ordered Chinese food.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What are the chances? 1 billion Chinese people and they send Mike!?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Phoebe called me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I'm sorry, I broke down... I wanted to see him.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Damnit Phoebe! How did you even call him?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: There is a speakerphone on the base unit...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Base Unit! Think Monica! Think!

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Look, if I wanna see Phoebe and she wants to see...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: This doesn't concern you!!

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Oh! Sorry, I guess I was thrown off by the mention of my name!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Look, guys, you can't do this, it's just going to make getting over each other, that much harder.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Not if nothing happens. Why can't... why can't we just hang out as friends?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Sure! If you're just gonna hang out as friends, then maybe I'll join ya. You know, I'm your friend and Mike's friend .

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Sit down.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh wow wow wow!! Make room for your friend!

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: So how've you been?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I've been pretty good!

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: You look really beautiful.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Thanks, you look good too.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh no no no no... this is dangerous territory. Keep it clean!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So how's the piano playing going?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Actually I've been playing a lot of love songs lately. I've missed you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I've missed you too.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You know, on the way over here, I saw this drunk guy throw up. And then a pigeon ate it!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, Ross, I just wanted to apologize... ..don't tell me you actually made those gay pictures of me?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: uhu uhu, check this out.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Huh! So that's what I would look like if I worked out... and was being serviced by a policeman. You're not actually going to send these out are ya?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Eh..actually no, I don't need to because your little "Ross is dead" joke didn't work, ok, there were no responses. Nobody posted anything on the website, nobody called my parents, so the joke my friend is on you. Nobody called, nobody wrote anything, nobody cares that I'm dead. Oh my God! Nobody cares that I'm dead!?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, come on, you know that's not true.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What are you talking about? You get sixty responses just for coming out of the closet! I didn't get one response! And I'm dead!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, the gay community is a lot more vocal than the dead community.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I can't believe this. Not even my geology lab partner? And I carried that guy!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Alright look, let's think about this, ok, do you really think that people are gonna stir up your family at this tragic time? That people are gonna post condolences on a website? This is not about people not caring that you're dead .This is about people not having a decent outlet for their grief.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You're right. There isn't a decent outlet.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Right, I mean, come on, I'm sure that if you had a funeral or a memorial service, tons of people would come.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Exactly!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ross, what're you... what're you... what are you doing? You're having a memorial service for yourself!?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! That would be stupid! You're having it for me!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ross, don't press send, don't press se... !

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: oh, too late, too late! It's sent... oops sorry and so is the picture of you and the police man...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I'm trying to put Emma down for a nap, have you seen Hugsy?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Original or crappy?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Original.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, sorry haven't seen him.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Then what's that big lump under your covers?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It's Monica, ok?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That's not Monica!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Alright!! Fine! It's original Hugsy! No, now I know that Emma wants him but he's mine and I need him..

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh God.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: ... she's being unreasonable!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey, there is a reason that Emma loves that stupid penguin so much Oh don't cover its ears! It's because it reminds her of her uncle Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It does?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah! And she's comforted by him because she loves her uncle Joey so much.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Really? She... she loves me?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh yeah! But you know what? If you need Hugsy, don't worry. Emma will totally understand. I won't... but whatever .

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ok, wait wait wait wait a minute wait a minute, I mean Rach, I mean if if... . If Hugsy means that much to Emma then... well she can have him.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oooh... you're sweet, I knew uncle Joey would step up. Look Emma, look who's baaack!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look forget it forget it... I can't do it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Are you gonna... you're going to take Hugsy away from a little child?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: How do you think I got him in the first place?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Alright you two, I'm gonna go to the bathroom. Now I don't want anything going on while I'm gone. Here's a few things you can discuss: mucus, fungus and the idea of me and Ross doing it.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: I've missed you so much! No, I'm not gonna ask you to get back together because I know we want different things, but just to be with you one more night.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I know, I want that too, but IS that going to make it too hard?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: It can't be any harder than this... I mean, If I had known the last time I saw you would be the last time, I... I would have stopped to memorize your face, the way you move, everything about you. If I had known the last time I kissed you would have been the last time... I never would have stopped.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Kiss him, you fool!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Didn't you hear that speech? If you don't kiss him then I will!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I missed you so much!

utterance.speaker: Strange man
utterance.content: I knew you'd be here!

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Oh, crap!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Who is this?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: My friend Manny. I asked him to keep me away from you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi, that's what I'm doing for Phoebe!

utterance.speaker: Manny
utterance.content: Well, you are not doing a very good job!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Excuse me?

utterance.speaker: Manny
utterance.content: What's with the kissing?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, at least I knew where my guy was.

utterance.speaker: Manny
utterance.content: Oh yeah yeah, thank God you were here to oversee all the kissing!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You didn't hear the speech!

utterance.speaker: Manny
utterance.content: I've heard the speech: "if he knew it was gonna be the last time he saw her... "

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, it was very moving! You're just heartless!

utterance.speaker: Manny
utterance.content: You're weak!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You're... weird!

utterance.speaker: Manny
utterance.content: Your pants are undone!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh !

utterance.speaker: Manny
utterance.content: Where did they go?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Damn it!

utterance.speaker: Manny
utterance.content: Oh we blew it. I blame myself.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And I blame you too.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It's been an hour and not one of my classmates has shown up! I tell you, when I actually die some people are gonna get seriously haunted!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: There you go! Someone came!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ok, ok! I'm gonna go hide! Oh, this is so exciting, my first mourner!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi, glad you could come.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Please, come in.

utterance.speaker: Tom
utterance.content: Hi, you're Chandler Bing, right? I'm Tom Gordon, I was in your class.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh yes, yes... let me... take your coat.

utterance.speaker: Tom
utterance.content: Thanks... uh... I'm so sorry about Ross, it's...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: At least he died doing what he loved... watching blimps

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Who is he?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Some guy, Tom Gordon.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don't remember him, but then again I touched so many lives.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So, did you know Ross well?

utterance.speaker: Tom
utterance.content: Oh, actually I barely knew him. Yeah, I came because I heard Chandler's news. D'you know if he's seeing anyone?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes, he is. Me.

utterance.speaker: Tom
utterance.content: What? You... You... Oh! Can I ask you a personal question? Ho-how do you shave your beard so close?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ok Tommy, that's enough mourning for you! Here we go, bye bye!!

utterance.speaker: Tom
utterance.content: Hey, listen. Call me.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ok!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'm dead and no one cares?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I look like a man??

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Please, one ridiculous problem at a time!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It isn't ridiculous, look around! No one's here!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You gave them one day's notice, not everyone in our class checks the web site everyday and Monica... it's probably the way you stand!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes, you're right. Still somebody must have seen it... I mean, I went to that school for 4 years, I didn't have an impact on anyone?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, that's not true. You had an impact on me, I mean, it's 15 years later and we're still best friends. Doesn't that count for something?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm sure it's somebody for you. Now, go hide.

utterance.speaker: Kori
utterance.content: Hi. I'm here for Ross Geller's memorial service.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Kori? Kori Weston?

utterance.speaker: Kori
utterance.content: Yeah...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wow! You look amazing!

utterance.speaker: Kori
utterance.content: And you are...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Chandler, Chandler Bing. I'm not gay, I'm not gay at all.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You are married though.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Don't listen to him, he's in a really bad mood!

utterance.speaker: Kori
utterance.content: I can't believe that Ross is gone. It is just so sad.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I didn't know Ross and you were so close.

utterance.speaker: Kori
utterance.content: We weren't but we had one class together. He was such a great guy and he talked so passionately about science. I always remembered him.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm sure that would mean a lot to him. And if heaven has a door, I'm sure he's pressing his ear up against it and listening intently.

utterance.speaker: Kori
utterance.content: I thought so many times about calling him and asking him out. I guess I really missed my chance.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: But you didn't! I'm still alive!! Kori, I know this is a big surprise for you. It's a long story but the things you just said really made my day! I mean, the fact that you are here means more to me than if this room were filled with people!

utterance.speaker: Kori
utterance.content: You sick freak, who does that? I can't believe I had a crush on you!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Did you hear that? Kori Weston had a crush on me!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No Mum, I'm not dead. I know it's not something to kid about. It was just a practical joke between Chandler and me, but it's over, ok? Actually no, even if I had died, you would not be left childless. Monica?
